title: A skin you thought would be terrible, but turned out to be one you really liked

replies.body: matador alistar. Got it from a mystery gift, was irritated because I don't play him and already have unchained. Matador though looks much better in game and when I have to support I can sometimes use it O:

Riot Girl Tristana, the new one

The old one I got simply because I could and got the champ for free

After the rework it became my favorite skin and I use it always with her, despite having other skins for her

Golden Alistar. Turns out he's not a colour swap anymore.
And when Riot gave mystery skins I got Fiddle me timbers while my friends got badger Teemo and Magnificent Twisted Fate. But then it turns out I like to do pirate accents and really overenjoyed myself.

I got Riot Blitzcrank as a mystery skin from Riot. I was a bit disappointed at first, because I had been planning on buying iBlitz for a while. However, after playing it a few times, I discovered that I liked the sound effects and flashing lights a ton! Plus, I love the fact that I can say Riot gave me a Riot skin.

Abyssal and Subterranean Nautilus.

Splash arts do not do those skins justice imo
Riot Blitzcrank, PAX Sivir, Arcade Hecarim
